statements: SELECT athlete_name, weight_lifted FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE weight_lifted > 100
SELECT * FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE athlete_id = 1
SELECT athlete_name, event_name, event_date FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, event_name FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE weight_lifted BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM weightlifting_performance ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT athlete_name, event_name, weight_lifted FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE weight_lifted > 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, event_name, event_date FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND weight_lifted BETWEEN 90 AND 150 ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, event_name, event_date, weight_lifted FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE event_name LIKE 'Clean%' ORDER BY weight_lifted DESC, event_date ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, weight_lifted FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY weight_lifted DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, SUM(weight_lifted) AS total_weight_lifted FROM weightlifting_performance GROUP BY athlete_name HAVING total_weight_lifted > 500 ORDER BY total_weight_lifted DESC;
SELECT * FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT lift_weight, weightlifting_category FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM weightlifting_events WHERE location = 'Gym';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM weightlifting_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, SUM(lift_weight) AS total_lift_weight FROM weightlifting_performance GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE athlete_id = 123 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT athlete_id, SUM(lift_weight) FROM weightlifting_performance GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING SUM(lift_weight) > 500
SELECT athlete_id, date, lift_weight FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE lift_weight > 100 ORDER BY date, lift_weight DESC
SELECT event_name, location FROM weightlifting_events ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT AVG(lift_weight) AS avg_lift_weight, weightlifting_category FROM weightlifting_performance GROUP BY weightlifting_category HAVING avg_lift_weight > 150
SELECT * FROM weightlifting_athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_country FROM weightlifting_athletes WHERE athlete_country='USA';
SELECT athlete_name, result FROM weightlifting_athletes JOIN weightlifting_results ON weightlifting_athletes.athlete_id = weightlifting_results.athlete_id;
SELECT competition_name, location FROM weightlifting_competitions ORDER BY competition_date DESC;

SELECT athlete_name, competition_name FROM weightlifting_athletes JOIN weightlifting_results ON weightlifting_athletes.athlete_id = weightlifting_results.athlete_id JOIN weightlifting_competitions ON weightlifting_results.competition_date = weightlifting_competitions.competition_date;
SELECT * FROM weightlifting_athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_country FROM weightlifting_athletes ORDER BY athlete_name;

SELECT athlete_name, competition_name, result FROM weightlifting_athletes INNER JOIN weightlifting_results ON weightlifting_athletes.athlete_id = weightlifting_results.athlete_id INNER JOIN weightlifting_competitions ON weightlifting_results.competition_date = weightlifting_competitions.competition_date;

SELECT athlete_name, lift_type, result FROM weightlifting_athletes INNER JOIN weightlifting_results ON weightlifting_athletes.athlete_id = weightlifting_results.athlete_id WHERE weight_category = 'Heavyweight' ORDER BY result DESC;

SELECT athlete_name, competition_name, location FROM weightlifting_athletes INNER JOIN weightlifting_results ON weightlifting_athletes.athlete_id = weightlifting_results.athlete_id INNER JOIN weightlifting_competitions ON weightlifting_results.competition_date = weightlifting_competitions.competition_date ORDER BY competition_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Weightlifters;
SELECT name, country, weight FROM Weightlifters WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT id, name, country, date_of_birth FROM Weightlifters WHERE country='USA';
SELECT name, weight, height FROM Weightlifters ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT name, weight_lifted, result FROM LiftStats WHERE competition_id=1 ORDER BY weight_lifted DESC;
SELECT * FROM Weightlifters WHERE country = 'USA' AND weight > 150.00 ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Weightlifters WHERE gender = 'Female' AND height < 160.00 ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;

SELECT Competitions.name, location, count(*) as total_weightlifters FROM Competitions JOIN LiftStats ON Competitions.id = LiftStats.competition_id GROUP BY Competitions.name, location ORDER BY total_weightlifters DESC;

SELECT Weightlifters.name, Records.record_type, Records.record_value FROM Weightlifters JOIN Records ON Weightlifters.id = Records.weightlifter_id WHERE Records.record_type = 'Deadlift' ORDER BY Records.record_value DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT Weightlifters.name, Competitions.name AS competition_name, LiftStats.weight_lifted, LiftStats.lift_date FROM Weightlifters JOIN LiftStats ON Weightlifters.id = LiftStats.weightlifter_id JOIN Competitions ON LiftStats.competition_id = Competitions.id WHERE LiftStats.lift_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY LiftStats.weight_lifted DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT athlete_name, weightlifting_type, weight_lifted FROM weightlifting_records WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, nationality, birth_date FROM athlete_details WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
SELECT competition_id, competition_name, competition_date FROM competition_results ORDER BY competition_date DESC;
SELECT coach_name, specialization, experience_years FROM coach_details WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT program_name, program_type, duration_in_weeks FROM training_program WHERE training_intensity = 'High';
SELECT athlete_name, weightlifting_type, weight_lifted FROM weightlifting_records WHERE athlete_id = 1
SELECT athlete_name, nationality, birth_date FROM athlete_details WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight'
SELECT competition_name, winning_athlete_id, winning_lift FROM competition_results ORDER BY competition_date DESC
SELECT coach_name, specialization, experience_years FROM coach_details WHERE experience_years > 5
SELECT program_name, program_type, duration_in_weeks FROM training_program ORDER BY program_id
